product_name: The Ordinary Natural Moisturizing Factors + HA
product_description: A hydrating formula with amino acids, dermal lipids, and hyaluronic acid.
Soybean Folic Acid Ferment Extract, Pygmy Waterlily Stem Cell Extract, Signal Peptide Complex.
An everyday cream with five ceramides to support skin’s moisture barrier and prevent water loss.
A plush gel cleanser, made with orange fruit water and PHA, that deeply cleanses and invigorates skin in one simple step—without stripping skin.
A highly active cleanser with a trio of exfoliating acids and jojoba skin-polishing beads to visibly brighten and reveal smoother, younger-looking skin.
